name: Colorless (julienelsa)
description:
A virus that turns everything black and white and manipulates humans started spreading on earth. The protagonist is one of the few survivors.
One day he finished his supplies and has to find a new place with supplies to survive.
Will he find a house in which he'll be able to survive without getting infected and manipulated by the virus?
This is a short drop-down shooter game, hope you enjoy it!
